name: Aeterna: Rubra Plena Demo
description:
Norelia was recently in an abusive relationship, which has pushed her into a deep depression, a bottomless pit devoid of emotions. She sees the world without color and has lost the will to achieve anything, living her life on autopilot. She distances herself them anyone she knows and sees people as faceless figures and dolls with strings attached.

This is a cycle she is familiar with until one day, she meets a man in a similar emotional situation. As they develop a bond, colors start to bleed back into her world. She starts to feel emotions she forgot were possible to feel.

But is everything as perfect as it seems?

The demo features:

  • Renameable heroine
  • Two alternative paths
  • Two animated CGs

Planned features:

  • Five routes (3 male, 1 female, 1 nonbinary) each with good and bad endings
  • Lots of CGs, animations and an original OST!
Join me on Discord!

I will post updates on the game, accept bug reports, and listen to your feedback! Help me shape the game in the early stages and keep me company!

You can join the discord community here: https://discord.gg/S2JvdMgF3J

The game contains references to a toxic relationship and depression, and is therefore recommended for an audience above eighteen.

Any donations will go straight into the development of the game!
